PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-14442017-11-23,  ,  ,  ,  ISED,  NRC,  , 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - The Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the National Research Council Canada to ENTER INTO A COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with The Professional Institute of the Public Service for all employees in the Translator Group for a four (4) year agreement expiring on 20 June 2018, pursuant to Section 112 of the FEDERAL PUBLIC SERVICE LABOUR RELATIONS ACT.
AttachmentsAttachment
